names.description: Ethnic name used to designate a person from Ashdod in Neo-Assyrian sources, especially royal inscriptions of Sargon II (r. 721-705 BC) and Sennacherib (r. 704-681 BC).

names.description: Ethnic name used to designate a person from Ashdod in several Neo-Assyrian letters (reigns of Tiglath-pileser III and Sargon II).

names.description: Ethnic name used to designate a person from Ashdod in an eighth-century-BC letter (reign of Tiglath-pileser III [r. 745-727 BC] or Sargon II [r. 721-705]).
